title: Color Revolution in America | Guest: Mike Gonzalez | 9/17/20
description:
The last 20 years of Glenn’s work culminated last night: The Left has all the levers needed for revolution, unless we know what’s going on. Fox News shut down Newt Gingrich for criticizing George Soros. “The Plot to Change America” author Mike Gonzalez discusses how a BLM co-founder has fiscally partnered with a Chinese group. AG Barr has greenlit charging some protesters with sedition. Glenn runs through how the Obama administration’s “7 Pillars of Color Revolution," used to flip countries like Ukraine, are all playing out in America. The Transition Integrity Project war-gamed countering a clear Trump win. Princeton University claimed that it is systemically racist, but math professor Sergiu Klainerman is fighting back.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
